New Canadian host provider offering Linux VPS with virtualizor control panel starting at $6/mo with the following:
1x3.4Ghz, 1GB ram, 50GB storage, 2TB transfer, 1 ipv4
We also offer 2 other plans and if you need something that isn't listed you can let us know and we'll give you a free quote for a custom VPS.  We also offer custom programming/admin services should you need them.

https://www.nofussvps.com
